doc.after: Alternative methods of structure learning search through the many possible causal structures among the variables and remove ones which are strongly incompatible with the observed correlations In general this leaves a set of possible causal relations which should then be tested by analyzing time series data or preferably designing appropriately controlled experiments In contrast with Bayesian Networks path analysis and its generalization structural equation modeling serve better to estimate a known causal effect or to test a causal model than to generate causal hypotheses
